item.title: ‘The Home’ Review: Pete Davidson Headlines Intriguing but Uneven Nursing-Home Horror From ‘The Purge’ Creator
item.description: The comedian stars as a troubled former foster kid who gets a job working at a secret-haunted care center for the elderly.

item.title: Pete Davidson Reflects on Becoming a Dad for the First Time: “I Did It!”
item.description: The ‘Saturday Night Live’ alum and girlfriend Elsie Hewitt are currently expecting their first child together.

item.title: Pete Davidson Expecting First Child With Elsie Hewitt: “Now Everyone Knows We Had Sex”
item.description: ‘People’ reported that the ‘Saturday Night Live’ star was dating the actress back in March after photos surfaced of them swimming in the ocean (and kissing) while in Palm Beach, Florida.
